displayProperties.tip: Rare drop from completing the 3rd encounter (Morgeth, the Spirekeeper).

Earned by opening the Glittering Key chest, found between the 3rd (Morgeth, the Spirekeeper) and 4th (The Vault) encounters if the "2nd Wish" has been entered.
Complete the raid for the first time.

Earned by entering the "3rd Wish" at the "Wall of Wishes".
